rows.label: qst630404_msg0001
rows.name: The grave of an Invidian mercenary...

rows.label: qst630404_msg0002
rows.name: Maybe it's one of Bonard's squad.

rows.label: qst630404_msg0003
rows.name:
The others must still be around here
somewhere.

rows.label: qst630404_msg0101
rows.name:
This is the grave of an Invidian
mercenary, isn't it?

rows.label: qst630404_msg0102
rows.name:
D'you reckon it might be one of the
squad we're looking for?

rows.label: qst630404_msg0103
rows.name:
We'd better find the others. They
can't have gone far from here.

rows.label: qst630404_msg0201
rows.name:
Meh-meh?!
Look like burying place for
Invidian mercenary...

rows.label: qst630404_msg0202
rows.name:
Maybe something happen to squad
of Bonard.

rows.label: qst630404_msg0203
rows.name:
Must find soon. If lucky, squad still
somewhere nearby!

rows.label: qst630404_msg0301
rows.name:
So we find ourselves at
the grave of an Invidian mercenary.

rows.label: qst630404_msg0302
rows.name:
Perhaps it belongs to one of the squad
that we seek.

rows.label: qst630404_msg0303
rows.name:
We mustn't let this dampen our spirit.
The others may yet be found.

rows.label: qst630404_msg0401
rows.name:
What is this, now? An Invidian 
mercenary's final resting place...

rows.label: qst630404_msg0403
rows.name:
But our task isn't over yet! The others
may still be nearby!
